hero.badge: TEAM MANAGEMENT + INTERACTIVE REMOTE TACTICAL TRAINING
hero.subtitle: The complete digital ecosystem for modern sports. From smart scheduling and live match updates to automated player development and the world's first multiplayer tactical engine - everything your club needs to win, on and off the pitch.

manifesto.description: Built to bridge the divide between coaching and execution—keeping your team aligned, even when they're apart.

item1.title: 1. ONE UNIFIED PLATFORM
item1.desc: Stop Operational Chaos. Replace fragmented tools for scheduling, chat, and match reports with one seamless, high-performance ecosystem.

item2.title: 2. REMOTE-READY BY DESIGN
item2.desc: Practice Without Boundaries. Turn weather disruptions into elite training opportunities with real-time, multiplayer tactical sessions on any device.

item3.title: 3. PLAYER DEVELOPMENT AT SCALE
item3.desc: Build a Digital Legacy. Automate player growth tracking with professional CVs and multi-season histories backed by real-time data.

item4.desc: Build a Culture, Not Just a Squad. Teams that learn together, stay together. VTAC creates a deep sense of belonging that keeps players inspired and parents engaged, ensuring your sports community stays together season after season.

management.badge: Built for How Teams Train Today

problem.title: The Problem
problem.desc: Teams lose valuable time to administrative work, scatter training data across disconnected tools.
problem.details: Scattered data and administrative bloat lead to a 40% drop in tactical retention. While aligning an entire squad is difficult, verifying who truly understands the plan is nearly impossible—leaving coaches blind to tactical gaps until it's too late on match day.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.desc: VTAC brings club operations and interactive tactical training into one seamless platform.
solution.details: VTAC unifies team organisation and management with our patented Interactive Remote Tactics engine. One digital home to deliver your club philosophy to every player—ensuring total tactical clarity on any device, anywhere, anytime.

outcome.title: The Outcome
outcome.desc: More time for coaching. Clearer tactical understanding. Stronger team performance supported by data.
outcome.details: VTAC streamlines management, making it fast and simple for everyone to stay in sync. By ensuring coaches and players share one clear tactical vision, teams play with total confidence and perfect execution—achieving elite standards through measurable, data-driven growth.

items.title: Information Silos
items.desc: Critical instructions lost in fragmented group chats and endless messaging threads.

items.title: Manual Workflows
items.desc: Coaches wasting hours on paper logs and scattered spreadsheets.

items.title: Static Learning
items.desc: Tactical plans delivered via outdated PDFs and one-way video.

items.title: Invisible Progress

items.title: Vanishing Data

items.title: Patented Tactical Engine
items.desc: Multi-player interactive sessions that bring plans to life, live.

items.title: Real-Time Synergy

hero.subtitle: Take your tactical briefing beyond the white board. VTAC MANAGER delivers the world’s first patented multiplayer tactical engine designed for the speed and complexity of modern football.

before.label: PRE-PITCH
before.headline: Tactical Blueprint
before.body: Don’t waste valuable pitch time. Use Interactive Remote Training to brief tactics from home or the locker room. Ensure every player is synchronized and ready to execute the moment they step onto the pitch.

during.label: LIVE-SYNC
during.headline: Smart Operations
during.body: Replace manual logs with intelligent automation. Manage live lineups and record attendance, scores, and match events in real-time. All data is instantly updated and synced for coaches, players, and parents.

after.label: POST-MATCH
after.headline: Adaptive Evolution
after.body: Turn match data into progress. Combine our Interactive Engine with professional image and video analysis tools to break down performances, fix tactical gaps, and prepare for the next challenge.

remote.label: BORDERLESS
remote.headline: Digital Legacy
remote.body: Secure your club’s future. All data is automatically synced to the cloud, building professional individual profiles and multi-season CVs for both players and coaches—accessible anytime, anywhere.

capabilities.subtitle: Opening the toolbox: Professional-grade features engineered for elite sports organisations.

gap.title: The Boredom Gap
gap.desc: One-way learning via PDFs and video clips feels like tedious "homework," leading to low retention.

killer.title: The Momentum Killer

bottomLine.label: The Bottom Line:
bottomLine.text: You are managing the clock, while the team remains in isolation.

bottomLine.label: The Bottom Line:
